channel.title: Mostly Unstarted Projects
channel.description: I've always got a list of projects simmering in the back of my mind. Regrettably few of them ever make it to the foreground. This is a list of most interesting of them.

item.title: Just doing it
item.description: I've been doing some math while Sarah has been writing, and hacking a little test driven python code when she's at her internship. I was inspired by Chris Winters' recent post, Getting good, and decided to just start somewhere on SVG animations. I also...

item.title: Applications for Werkflow
item.description: Werkflow ideas: Turbine 3 valves, and graceful ﻿degradation of service under increasing load
